name: Leia Burger
instructions:
1. Preheat your grill.
2. Cook the meat.
3. Layer cheese on the meat.
4. Grill until cheese is melted.

name: Luke Burger
instructions:
1. Grill the meat.
2. Slice the tomato.
3. Layer lettuce, meat, and tomato.
4. Serve immediately.

name: Ham Solo Burger
instructions:
1. Cook the bacon.
2. Layer cheese and meat.
3. Grill until cheese is melted.
4. Add bacon on top.

name: Double Ham Solo
instructions:
1. Cook the bacon.
2. Layer cheese and meat.
3. Grill until cheese is melted.
4. Add bacon on top and repeat layers.

name: All-green Yoda Burger
instructions:
1. Layer lettuce, tomato, and cucumber.
2. Top with cheese.
3. Grill until cheese is melted.
4. Serve immediately.
